section.title: Recommended minimum hardware requirements for an entry-scale KVM model
section.p: These recommended minimums are based on the included example configurations included with the base installation and are suitable only for demo environments. For production systems you will want to consider your capacity and performance requirements when making decisions about your hardware.
section.note: The disk requirements detailed below can be met with logical drives, logical volumes, or external storage such as a 3PAR array.

section.title: Recommended minimum hardware requirements for an entry-scale Ironic flat network model
section.p: When using the agent_ilo driver, you should ensure that the most recent iLO controller firmware is installed. A recommended minimum for the iLO4 controller is version 2.30.

section.title: Recommended minimum hardware requirements for an entry-scale Swift model
section.p: These recommended minimums are based on the included example configurations included with the base installation and are suitable only for demo environments. For production systems you will want to consider your capacity and performance requirements when making decisions about your hardware.

The entry-scale-swift example runs the Swift proxy, account and container services on the three controller servers. However, it is possible to extend the model to include the Swift proxy, account and container services on dedicated servers (typically referred to as the Swift proxy servers). If you are using this model, we have included the recommended Swift proxy servers specs in the table below.
